about_the_game:
NOTE: This Screenshot only contains the starting point of the Game the full game will be in Dark-Night and contains a lot of more details.


When Hitler passed away and left a mysterious secret behind, there were certain top-level generals who had all the information about him. Following his demise, all of them have one objective: locate the bunker and demolish everything in it. The journey was started by all of them, but they have failed to succeed and you're the only person who knows the location of the bunker and that's how it starts.



This game is primarily a first-person narrative walking simulator with Story telling, Puzzle Solving, exploration, driving, and conversation mechanics.




  • Realistic World War II Environment.
  • Atmospheric ambience.
  • Problem solving in a non-linear open world.
  • Tactile and physics based interactions with the world.
  • Immersive sound design.
  • Receive texts from NPCs.
  • Great Storyline.
  • Puzzle Solving.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a realistic atmosphere. Player characters can die through various means, some involving dismemberment or decapitation. Player characters can use fictional medical drugs recklessly.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Big SUR
  • Processor: Cor i7-5500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT or Apple M1 based
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: UNCOVERED : 1945

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 350X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 11
  • Processor: Cor i7-5500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in an exiting World War II Story about Hitler Secret Bunker and what does he leave behind, Get ready for a new Jurney of exploration and Uncover the Secrets of the bunkers. Will you be able to succeed?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
